Chore: Send a memes of your own choosing to the chores chat
Pick up any TP or paper towels on the floor. Empty composts bins if over half full. Add new roll of TP to toilets if current roll is low. Check hand paper towels, replace if needed
Pick up any TP or paper towels on the floor. Empty composts bins if over half full. Add new roll of TP to toilets if current roll is low. Check hand paper towels, replace if needed

Urinal: spray urinal and floor below urinal with the urine remover spray (found below sink), then wait 5 min before wiping down with paper towel. Toilets: clean the seat, the cover, inside bowl, outside bowl, the section behind the lid, then wipe.
Toilets: clean the seat, the cover, inside bowl, outside bowl, the section behind the lid, then wipe.
Remove all hair from shower area (grab with paper towel). Scrub shower floors (esp around drains) with comet or bleach spray. Entire area should smell like bleach. Rinse with water.
Remove all hair from shower area (grab with paper towel). Scrub shower floors (esp around drains) with comet or bleach spray. Entire area should smell like bleach. Rinse with water.
Take out trash and recycling if more than half full. Replace trash bags.
Mop bathroom floor with swiffer. Get some water onto the dirty spots then use the swiffer to wipe up. If swiffer pad gets nasty, replace with one from the box

Desc: Bathroom Mirrors, Counters, and Sink (2nd floor)
Chore: Clean bathroom mirrors with spray and paper towel. Wipe down counters, sink handles, and inside of sink

Get rid of all leftovers from last week, unless it's something that can last (i.e. deli day ham). Wash the containers. Strongly recommended: do with Gerard before he leaves for the day, as he knows what is old.

Desc: Bathroom Mirrors, Counters, and Sink (basement + 3rd floor)
Chore: Clean bathroom mirrors with spray and paper towel. Wipe down counters, sink handles, and inside of sink
Sweep back stairs starting from the 3rd floor down to the 1st floor (to the freezer).
Sweep back stairs starting from the 1st floor (at the freezer) down to basement, then sweep basement halls to the gym.
Vacuum 3rd floor hallway and sector.  Empty vacuum if it's more than 1/2 full
Vacuum 2nd floor hallway.  Empty vacuum if it's more than 1/2 full
Vacuum carpet in living room. Empty vacuum if it's more than 1/2 full. Throw away any stray trash and bring back plates & utensils
Vacuum stairs from 2nd floor to 3rd floor. Empty vacuum if it's more than 1/2 full
Vacuum stairs from 1st floor to 2nd floor. Empty vacuum if it's more than 1/2 full
Use alcohol wipes to get all the dirt and dust on all the wood parts of the stairs (ground next to carpet, railings). Probably going to need several wipes.
Use alcohol wipes to get all the dirt and dust on all the wood parts of the stairs (ground next to carpet, railings). Probably going to need several wipes.
Check the bin of rags underneath the sink. If it's mostly full, run them through the laundry. Put clean rags in the bin above the sink
Water Techico's 3 plants (1 in living room, 2 in library) with about 1/2 - 1 cup each depending on how dry they look. Pick up random trash, bring back cups, plates, and utensils.
Sweep gym floor. Use alcohol wipe to clean the dumbbells and bar.
Sweep ground, throw away stray trash, empty trash and recycling if they're more than half full, bring back plates and utensils
Run 'self clean' on the washing machine, empty lint collector for dryer, empty trash if needed, open the washers and driers and wipe the inside of the rims (get the gunk out).
Spray and wipe down all windows on 2nd and 3rd floor. Window cleaner should be under 2nd floor sink and/or in chore closet.
Spray and wipe down all windows in living room. Window cleaner should be under 2nd floor sink and/or in chore closet.
Everything should look organized and there should be room to walk all the way to the back of the closet.
